summary: Implement a simplified admin authentication system by removing Internet Identity auth and replacing it with custom username/password login, backed by a Supabase profiles table with roles and an admin-only dashboard for user management.
architectural_notes: Auth will not use Internet Identity; replace with custom username/password login.
User roles stored in Supabase profiles table; /admin protected by role==='admin'.
Supabase RLS required: admin full CRUD; users read own profile; no unauthenticated access.
known_issues: Admin access currently failing ('access denied') under Internet Identity; needs to be disabled/replaced per new auth plan.

existing_features.title: Disable the Internet Identity authentication flow for the admin system UI so users can no longer log in to the admin area using Internet Identity.
Add a custom admin authentication flow using a username and password, with an initial hardcoded primary admin credential set: Username "Administrator" and Password "AdminAAboxes26".
Update the admin dashboard to use the new custom auth session (and provide logout) while keeping the existing admin content management panels functional.
Add admin user management capability so the admin can create additional users with username/password and role, and view the list of existing users.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove/disable Internet Identity authentication and related UI/providers (no more Internet Identity login)
Implement custom username/password login page with initial hardcoded admin credentials (Administrator / AdminAAboxes26)
Create Supabase profiles table (id uuid PK, username unique, role default 'user', created_at) and seed Administrator as role='admin'
Add protected /admin route accessible only to users with role==='admin' and build Admin User Management (list users, create users with username/password/role)
Enable Supabase RLS on profiles: admins full CRUD; users can read own profile only; unauthenticated users no access

Implement backend support for username/password-based admin sessions and authorization, replacing the current admin authorization reliance on Internet Identity principals for admin-dashboard operations.

projectName: Disable Internet Identity for Admin Access and Implement Simple Username/Password Admin Login
